info.title: Unofficial Peloton API
info.description: This is an unofficial/unsupported peloton API that was documented through Swagger Inspector. Some URLs are protected, and you will be required to post to the Login endpoint to obtain a session ID which then gets sent in future requests as your peloton_session_id cookie.  You will also need a peloton-platform header for some of the newer requests, which for now should be set to 'web'

tags.name: users
tags.description: Operations related to a Peloton User

tags.name: public
tags.description: Endpoints that do not require authentication

post.summary: Authenticates a user and creates a session
post.description: The session_id that results from this login will be needed as a 'peloton_session_id' cookie on subsequent non-public requests to the API.

get.summary: Get followers for a given user

200.description: List of followers for a given user

get.description: Gets a list of instructors (Note that paging starts at 0)
Get activity calendar for a given user
